s0352.chinese: 後幽王得褒姒，愛之，欲廢申后，并去太子宜臼，以褒姒為后，以伯服為太子。

s0353.chinese: 周太史伯陽讀史記曰：「周亡矣。」
s0353.literal: Fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0354.chinese: 昔自夏后氏之衰也，有二神龍止於夏帝庭而言曰：「余，褒之二君。」
s0354.literal: Sixth year, Xi Fu Ren, a woman from Chen, passed through Cai, Cai did not show courtesy, hated her.

s0355.chinese: 夏帝卜殺之與去之與止之，莫吉。
s0355.literal: Chu attacked Cai, captured Duke Ai and returned.

s0356.literal: Seventh year, Duke Huan of Song, Yu Yue, first year.

s0357.chinese: 於是布幣而策告之，龍亡而漦在，櫝而去之。

s0360.chinese: 比三代，莫敢發之，至厲王之末，發而觀之。

s0361.literal: Eleventh year, Duke Xiang of Song, Zi Fu, first year.

s0363.chinese: 漦化為玄黿，以入王後宮。
s0363.literal: Twelfth year, Duke Xiang of Song, Zi Fu, first year.

s0364.chinese: 後宮之童妾既齔而遭之，既笄而孕，無夫而生子，懼而棄之。

s0365.chinese: 宣王之時童女謠曰：「厭弧箕服，實亡周國。」

s0366.chinese: 於是宣王聞之，有夫婦賣是器者，宣王使執而戮之。
s0366.literal: Fourteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0367.chinese: 逃於道，而見鄉者後宮童妾所棄妖子出於路者，聞其夜啼，哀而收之，夫婦遂亡，奔於褒。
s0367.literal: Fifteenth year, Duke Mu of Qin, first year.

s0368.chinese: 褒人有罪，請入童妾所棄女子者於王以贖罪。
s0368.literal: Sixteenth year, Xun Xi used treasures to borrow passage from Yu to attack Guo, extinguished Xia Yang.

s0369.chinese: 棄女子出於褒，是為褒姒。
s0369.literal: Seventeenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0370.chinese: 當幽王三年，王之後宮見而愛之，生子伯服，竟廢申后及太子，以褒姒為后，伯服為太子。
s0370.literal: Eighteenth year, Duke Zhuang of Zheng, Wu Sheng, first year.

s0371.chinese: 太史伯陽曰：「禍成矣，無可奈何！」
s0371.literal: Nineteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0373.chinese: 褒姒不好笑，幽王欲其笑萬方，故不笑。
s0373.literal: Twentieth year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.

s0374.chinese: 幽王為烽燧大鼓，有寇至則舉烽火。
s0374.literal: Twenty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0375.chinese: 諸侯悉至，至而無寇，褒姒乃大笑。
s0375.literal: Twenty-second year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.

s0376.literal: Twenty-third year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.

s0377.chinese: 其後不信，諸侯益亦不至。
s0377.literal: Twenty-fourth year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.

s0378.chinese: 幽王以虢石父為卿，用事，國人皆怨。
s0378.literal: Twenty-fifth year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.

s0379.chinese: 石父為人佞巧善諛好利，王用之。
s0379.literal: Twenty-sixth year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.

s0380.literal: Twenty-seventh year, Duke Wen of Qin, Fei Zi, first year.

s0381.chinese: 申侯怒，與繒、西夷犬戎攻幽王。
s0381.literal: Twenty-eighth year, Xun Xi used treasures to borrow passage from Yu to attack Guo, extinguished Xia Yang.

s0382.chinese: 幽王舉烽火徵兵，兵莫至。
s0382.literal: Twenty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0383.chinese: 遂殺幽王驪山下，虜褒姒，盡取周賂而去。
s0383.literal: They killed King You at the foot of Li Mountain, captured Bao Si, took all Zhou's treasures and left.

s0384.chinese: 於是諸侯乃即申侯而共立故幽王太子宜臼，是為平王，以奉周祀。
s0384.literal: Therefore the lords went to Shen Hou and together established the former King You's crown prince Yi Jiu, this was King Ping, to continue the Zhou sacrifices.

s0385.chinese: 平王立，東遷于雒邑，辟戎寇。
s0385.literal: King Ping ascended, moved east to Luoyi, to avoid the Rong invaders.

s0386.chinese: 平王之時，周室衰微，諸侯彊并弱，齊、楚、秦、晉始大，政由方伯。
s0386.literal: In King Ping's time, the Zhou house declined and weakened, the lords strong annexed the weak, Qi, Chu, Qin, Jin began to grow great, government was by the regional lords.

s0387.literal: Forty-ninth year, Duke Yin of Lu ascended.

s0388.chinese: 五十一年，平王崩，太子洩父蚤死，立其子林，是為桓王。
s0388.literal: Fifty-first year, Duke Huan of Lu ascended.

s0389.literal: Fifty-second year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0390.chinese: 桓王三年，鄭莊公朝，桓王不禮。
s0390.literal: Fifty-third year, Duke Zhuang of Lu ascended.

s0391.literal: Fifty-fourth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0392.chinese: 許田，天子之用事太山田也。
s0392.literal: Fifty-fifth year, Duke Xi of Lu ascended.

s0393.literal: Fifty-sixth year, Duke Wen of Lu ascended.

s0394.chinese: 十三年，伐鄭，鄭射傷桓王，桓王去歸。
s0394.literal: Fifty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0395.chinese: 二十三年，桓王崩，子莊王佗立。
s0395.literal: Fifty-eighth year, Duke Xuan of Lu ascended.

s0396.chinese: 莊王四年，周公黑肩欲殺莊王而立王子克。
s0396.literal: Fifty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0397.literal: Sixtieth year, Duke Cheng of Lu ascended.

s0398.literal: Sixty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0399.chinese: 十五年，莊王崩，子釐王胡齊立。
s0399.literal: Sixty-second year, Duke Xiang of Lu ascended.

s0400.literal: Sixty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0401.chinese: 五年，釐王崩，子惠王閬立。
s0401.literal: Sixty-fourth year, Duke Zhao of Lu ascended.

s0402.literal: Sixty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0403.chinese: 初，莊王嬖姬姚，生子穨，穨有寵。
s0403.literal: Sixty-sixth year, Duke Ding of Lu ascended.

s0404.chinese: 及惠王即位，奪其大臣以為囿，故大夫邊伯等五人作亂，謀召燕、衛師，伐惠王。
s0404.literal: Sixty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0405.literal: Sixty-eighth year, Duke Ai of Lu ascended.

s0406.literal: Sixty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0407.literal: Seventieth year, Duke Dao of Lu ascended.

s0408.chinese: 四年，鄭與虢君伐殺王穨，復入惠王。
s0408.literal: Seventy-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0409.chinese: 惠王十年，賜齊桓公為伯。
s0409.literal: Seventy-second year, Duke Yuan of Lu ascended.

s0410.chinese: 二十五年，惠王崩，子襄王鄭立。
s0410.literal: Seventy-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0411.chinese: 襄王母蚤死，後母曰惠后。
s0411.literal: Seventy-fourth year, Duke Mu of Lu ascended.

s0412.chinese: 惠后生叔帶，有寵於惠王，襄王畏之。
s0412.literal: Seventy-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0413.chinese: 三年，叔帶與戎、翟謀伐襄王，襄王欲誅叔帶，叔帶奔齊。
s0413.literal: Seventy-sixth year, Duke Gong of Lu ascended.

s0414.chinese: 齊桓公使管仲平戎于周，使隰朋平戎于晉。
s0414.literal: Seventy-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0415.literal: Seventy-eighth year, Duke Kang of Lu ascended.

s0416.chinese: 管仲辭曰：「臣賤有司也，有天子之二守國、高在。
s0416.literal: Seventy-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0417.chinese: 若節春秋來承王命，何以禮焉。
s0417.literal: Eightieth year, Duke Ding of Lu ascended.

s0418.literal: Eighty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0419.chinese: 王曰：「舅氏，余嘉乃勳，毋逆朕命。」
s0419.literal: Eighty-second year, Duke Ai of Lu ascended.

s0420.chinese: 管仲卒受下卿之禮而還。
s0420.literal: Eighty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0421.literal: Eighty-fourth year, Duke Dao of Lu ascended.

s0422.literal: Eighty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0423.chinese: 十三年，鄭伐滑，王使游孫、伯服請滑，鄭人囚之。
s0423.literal: Eighty-sixth year, Duke Yuan of Lu ascended.

s0424.chinese: 鄭文公怨惠王之入不與厲公爵，又怨襄王之與衛滑，故囚伯服。
s0424.literal: Eighty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0425.literal: Eighty-eighth year, Duke Mu of Lu ascended.

s0426.chinese: 富辰諫曰：「凡我周之東徙，晉、鄭焉依。
s0426.literal: Eighty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0427.chinese: 子穨之亂，又鄭之由定，今以小怨棄之！」
s0427.literal: Ninetieth year, Duke Gong of Lu ascended.

s0428.literal: Ninety-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0429.chinese: 十五年，王降翟師以伐鄭。
s0429.literal: Ninety-second year, Duke Kang of Lu ascended.

s0430.chinese: 王德翟人，將以其女為后。
s0430.literal: Ninety-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0431.chinese: 富辰諫曰：「平、桓、莊、惠皆受鄭勞，王棄親親翟，不可從。」
s0431.literal: Fu Chen advised: 'Ping, Huan, Zhuang, Hui all received service from Zheng, if the king abandons his relatives and favors Di, it cannot be followed.'

s0433.chinese: 十六年，王絀翟后，翟人來誅，殺譚伯。
s0433.literal: Sixteenth year, the king deposed the Di queen, the Di people came to attack, killed Tan Bo.

s0434.literal: Fu Chen said: 'I have advised many times and you did not follow.

s0435.chinese: 如是不出，王以我為懟乎？」
s0435.literal: If I do not leave now, will the king consider me resentful?'

s0437.chinese: 初，惠后欲立王子帶，故以黨開翟人，翟人遂入周。
s0437.literal: Seventeenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0438.chinese: 襄王出奔鄭，鄭居王于汜。
s0438.literal: Eighteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0439.chinese: 子帶立為王，取襄王所絀翟后與居溫。
s0439.literal: Nineteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0440.chinese: 十七年，襄王告急于晉，晉文公納王而誅叔帶。
s0440.literal: Twentieth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0441.chinese: 襄王乃賜晉文公珪鬯弓矢，為伯，以河內地與晉。
s0441.literal: Twenty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0442.chinese: 二十年，晉文公召襄王，襄王會之河陽、踐土，諸侯畢朝，書諱曰「天王狩于河陽」。
s0442.literal: Twenty-second year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0443.literal: Twenty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0444.literal: Twenty-fourth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0445.chinese: 三十二年，襄王崩，子頃王壬臣立。
s0445.literal: Twenty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0446.chinese: 頃王六年，崩，子匡王班立。
s0446.literal: Twenty-sixth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0447.chinese: 匡王六年，崩，弟瑜立，是為定王。
s0447.literal: Twenty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0448.chinese: 定王元年，楚莊王伐陸渾之戎，次洛，使人問九鼎。
s0448.literal: Twenty-eighth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0449.chinese: 王使王孫滿應設以辭，楚兵乃去。
s0449.literal: Twenty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0450.chinese: 十年，楚莊王圍鄭，鄭伯降，已而復之。
s0450.literal: Thirtieth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0451.literal: Thirty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0452.chinese: 二十一年，定王崩，子簡王夷立。
s0452.literal: Thirty-second year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0453.chinese: 簡王十三年，晉殺其君厲公，迎子周於周，立為悼公。
s0453.literal: Thirty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0454.chinese: 十四年，簡王崩，子靈王泄心立。
s0454.literal: Thirty-fourth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0455.chinese: 靈王二十四年，齊崔杼弒其君莊公。
s0455.literal: Thirty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0456.chinese: 二十七年，靈王崩，子景王貴立。
s0456.literal: Thirty-sixth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0457.chinese: 景王十八年，后太子聖而蚤卒。
s0457.literal: Thirty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0458.chinese: 二十年，景王愛子朝，欲立之，會崩，子丐之黨與爭立，國人立長子猛為王，子朝攻殺猛。
s0458.literal: Thirty-eighth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0459.literal: Thirty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0460.chinese: 晉人攻子朝而立丐，是為敬王。
s0460.literal: Fortieth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0461.chinese: 敬王元年，晉人入敬王，子朝自立，敬王不得入，居澤。
s0461.literal: Forty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0462.chinese: 四年，晉率諸侯入敬王于周，子朝為臣，諸侯城周。
s0462.literal: Forty-second year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0463.chinese: 十六年，子朝之徒復作亂，敬王奔于晉。
s0463.literal: Forty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0464.chinese: 十七年，晉定公遂入敬王于周。
s0464.literal: Forty-fourth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0465.chinese: 三十九年，齊田常殺其君簡公。
s0465.literal: Forty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0466.literal: Forty-sixth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0467.literal: Forty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0468.chinese: 四十二年，敬王崩，子元王仁立。
s0468.literal: Forty-eighth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0469.chinese: 元王八年，崩，子定王介立。
s0469.literal: Forty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0470.chinese: 定王十六年，三晉滅智伯，分有其地。
s0470.literal: Fiftieth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0471.chinese: 二十八年，定王崩，長子去疾立，是為哀王。
s0471.literal: Fifty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0472.chinese: 哀王立三月，弟叔襲殺哀王而自立，是為思王。
s0472.literal: Fifty-second year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0473.chinese: 思王立五月，少弟嵬攻殺思王而自立，是為考王。
s0473.literal: Fifty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0474.literal: Fifty-fourth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0475.chinese: 考王十五年，崩，子威烈王午立。
s0475.literal: Fifty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0476.chinese: 考王封其弟于河南，是為桓公，以續周公之官職。
s0476.literal: Fifty-sixth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0477.literal: Fifty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0478.chinese: 威公卒，子惠公代立，乃封其少子於鞏以奉王，號東周惠公。
s0478.literal: Fifty-eighth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0479.chinese: 威烈王二十三年，九鼎震。
s0479.literal: Fifty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0480.literal: Sixtieth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0481.chinese: 二十四年，崩，子安王驕立。
s0481.literal: Twenty-fourth year, he died, his son An Wang Jiao ascended.

s0482.literal: This year robbers killed Chu Sheng Wang.

s0483.chinese: 安王立二十六年，崩，子烈王喜立。
s0483.literal: An Wang ascended for twenty-six years, died, his son Lie Wang Xi ascended.

s0484.chinese: 烈王二年，周太史儋見秦獻公曰：「始周與秦國合而別，別五百載復合，合十七歲而霸王者出焉。」
s0484.literal: Lie Wang second year, Zhou Grand Historian Dan saw Qin Xian Gong and said: 'Originally Zhou and Qin were united then separated, separated five hundred years then reunited, united seventeen years and a hegemon-king will emerge.'

s0486.chinese: 十年，烈王崩，弟扁立，是為顯王。
s0486.literal: Tenth year, Lie Wang died, his younger brother Bian ascended, this was Xian Wang.

s0487.chinese: 顯王五年，賀秦獻公，獻公稱伯。
s0487.literal: Xian Wang fifth year, congratulated Qin Xian Gong, Xian Gong was called hegemon.

s0488.chinese: 九年，致文武胙於秦孝公。
s0488.literal: Ninth year, sent the sacrifices of Wen and Wu to Qin Xiao Gong.

s0489.chinese: 二十五年，秦會諸侯於周。

s0490.chinese: 二十六年，周致伯於秦孝公。
s0490.literal: Twenty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0492.chinese: 三十五年，致文武胙於秦惠王。
s0492.literal: Twenty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0493.literal: Twenty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0494.literal: Twenty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0495.chinese: 四十八年，顯王崩，子慎靚王定立。
s0495.literal: Thirty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0496.chinese: 慎靚王立六年，崩，子赧王延立。
s0496.literal: Thirty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0497.literal: Thirty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0498.literal: Thirty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0499.chinese: 西周武公之共太子死，有五庶子，毋適立。
s0499.literal: Thirty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0500.chinese: 司馬翦謂楚王曰：「不如以地資公子咎，為請太子。」
s0500.literal: Forty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0501.literal: Forty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0502.chinese: 周不聽，是公之知困而交疏於周也。
s0502.literal: Forty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0503.chinese: 不如請周君孰欲立，以微告翦，翦請令楚（賀）［資］之以地。」
s0503.literal: Forty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0504.literal: Forty-eighth year, Xian Wang died, his son Shenjing Wang ascended.

s0505.literal: Shenjing Wang first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0506.chinese: 而楚以周為秦故，將伐之。
s0506.literal: Second year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0507.chinese: 蘇代為周說楚王曰：「何以周為秦之禍也？
s0507.literal: Third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0508.chinese: 言周之為秦甚於楚者，欲令周入秦也，故謂『周秦』也。
s0508.literal: Fourth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0509.chinese: 周知其不可解，必入於秦，此為秦取周之精者也。
s0509.literal: Fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0510.chinese: 為王計者，周於秦因善之，不於秦亦言善之，以疏之於秦。
s0510.literal: Sixth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0511.literal: Seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0513.chinese: 秦借道兩周之閒，將以伐韓，周恐借之畏於韓，不借畏於秦。
s0513.literal: Eighth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0514.chinese: 史厭謂周君曰：「何不令人謂韓公叔曰『秦之敢絕周而伐韓者，信東周也。
s0514.literal: Ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0515.chinese: 公何不與周地，發質使之楚』？
s0515.literal: Tenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0516.chinese: 秦必疑楚不信周，是韓不伐也。
s0516.literal: Eleventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0517.chinese: 又謂秦曰『韓彊與周地，將以疑周於秦也，周不敢不受』。
s0517.literal: Twelfth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0518.chinese: 秦必無辭而令周不受，是受地於韓而聽於秦。」
s0518.literal: Thirteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0520.chinese: 秦召西周君，西周君惡往，故令人謂韓王曰：「秦召西周君，將以使攻王之南陽也，王何不出兵於南陽？
s0520.literal: Fourteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0521.literal: Fifteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0522.chinese: 周君不入秦，秦必不敢踰河而攻南陽矣。」
s0522.literal: Sixteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0524.chinese: 東周與西周戰，韓救西周。
s0524.literal: Seventeenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0525.chinese: 或為東周說韓王曰：「西周故天子之國，多名器重寶。
s0525.literal: Eighteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0526.chinese: 王案兵毋出，可以德東周，而西周之寶必可以盡矣。」
s0526.literal: Nineteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0528.literal: Twentieth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0529.chinese: 楚圍雍氏，韓徵甲與粟於東周，東周君恐，召蘇代而告之。
s0529.literal: Twenty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0530.literal: Twenty-second year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0531.chinese: 臣能使韓毋徵甲與粟於周，又能為君得高都。」
s0531.literal: Twenty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0532.chinese: 周君曰：「子茍能，請以國聽子。」
s0532.literal: Twenty-fourth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0533.chinese: 代見韓相國曰：「楚圍雍氏，期三月也，今五月不能拔，是楚病也。
s0533.literal: Twenty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0534.chinese: 今相國乃徵甲與粟於周，是告楚病也。」
s0534.literal: Twenty-sixth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0535.literal: Twenty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0536.literal: Twenty-eighth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0537.literal: Twenty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0538.chinese: 韓相國大怒曰：「吾毋徵甲與粟於周亦已多矣，何故與周高都也？」
s0538.literal: Thirtieth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0539.chinese: 代曰：「與周高都，是周折而入於韓也，秦聞之必大怒忿周，即不通周使，是以獘高都得完周也。
s0539.literal: Thirty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0540.literal: Thirty-second year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0541.literal: Thirty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0542.literal: Thirty-fourth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0543.chinese: 三十四年，蘇厲謂周君曰：「秦破韓、魏，撲師武，北取趙藺、離石者，皆白起也。
s0543.literal: Thirty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0544.literal: Thirty-sixth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0545.chinese: 今又將兵出塞攻梁，梁破則周危矣。
s0545.literal: Thirty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0546.literal: Thirty-eighth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0547.chinese: 曰『楚有養由基者，善射者也。
s0547.literal: Thirty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0548.chinese: 去柳葉百步而射之，百發而百中之。
s0548.literal: Fortieth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0549.chinese: 左右觀者數千人，皆曰善射。
s0549.literal: Forty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0550.chinese: 有一夫立其旁，曰「善，可教射矣」。
s0550.literal: Forty-second year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0551.chinese: 養由基怒，釋弓搤劍，曰「客安能教我射乎」？
s0551.literal: Forty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0552.chinese: 客曰「非吾能教子支左詘右也。
s0552.literal: Forty-fourth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0553.chinese: 夫去柳葉百步而射之，百發而百中之，不以善息，少焉氣衰力倦，弓撥矢鉤，一發不中者，百發盡息」。
s0553.literal: Forty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0554.chinese: 今破韓、魏，撲師武，北取趙藺、離石者，公之功多矣。
s0554.literal: Forty-sixth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0555.chinese: 今又將兵出塞，過兩周，倍韓，攻梁，一舉不得，前功盡棄。
s0555.literal: Forty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0556.literal: Forty-eighth year, Shenjing Wang died, his son Nan Wang ascended.

s0558.literal: Nan Wang first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0559.chinese: 馬犯謂周君曰：「請令梁城周。」
s0559.literal: Second year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0560.chinese: 乃謂梁王曰：「周王病若死，則犯必死矣。
s0560.literal: Third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0561.chinese: 犯請以九鼎自入於王，王受九鼎而圖犯。」
s0561.literal: Fourth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0562.literal: Fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0563.literal: Sixth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0564.chinese: 因謂秦王曰：「梁非戍周也，將伐周也。
s0564.literal: Seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0565.literal: Eighth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0566.literal: Ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0567.chinese: 又謂梁王曰：「周王病甚矣，犯請後可而復之。
s0567.literal: Tenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0568.chinese: 今王使卒之周，諸侯皆生心，後舉事且不信。
s0568.literal: Eleventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0569.chinese: 不若令卒為周城，以匿事端。」
s0569.literal: Twelfth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0570.literal: Thirteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0571.literal: Fourteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0572.chinese: 四十五年，周君之秦客謂周（最）［聚］曰：「公不若譽秦王之孝，因以應為太后養地，秦王必喜，是公有秦交。
s0572.literal: Fifteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0573.literal: Sixteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0574.chinese: 交惡，勸周君入秦者必有罪矣。」
s0574.literal: Seventeenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0575.chinese: 秦攻周，而周聚謂秦王曰：「為王計者不攻周。
s0575.literal: Eighteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0576.chinese: 攻周，實不足以利，聲畏天下。
s0576.literal: Nineteenth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0577.chinese: 天下以聲畏秦，必東合於齊。
s0577.literal: Twentieth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0578.literal: Twenty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0579.chinese: 合天下於齊，則秦不王矣。
s0579.literal: Twenty-second year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0580.literal: Twenty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0581.chinese: 秦與天下獘，則令不行矣。」
s0581.literal: Twenty-fourth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0583.literal: Twenty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0584.chinese: 周令其相國之秦，以秦之輕也，還其行。
s0584.literal: Twenty-sixth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0585.chinese: 客謂相國曰：「秦之輕重未可知也。
s0585.literal: Twenty-seventh year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0586.literal: Twenty-eighth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0587.chinese: 公不如急見秦王曰『請為王聽東方之變』，秦王必重公。
s0587.literal: Twenty-ninth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0588.chinese: 重公，是秦重周，周以取秦也；
s0588.literal: Thirtieth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0589.chinese: 齊重，則固有周聚以收齊：是周常不失重國之交也。」
s0589.literal: Thirty-first year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0590.literal: Thirty-second year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0591.chinese: 五十九年，秦取韓陽城負黍，西周恐，倍秦，與諸侯約從，將天下銳師出伊闕攻秦，令秦無得通陽城。
s0591.literal: Thirty-third year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0592.chinese: 秦昭王怒，使將軍摎攻西周。
s0592.literal: Thirty-fourth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0593.chinese: 西周君犇秦，頓首受罪，盡獻其邑三十六，口三萬。
s0593.literal: Thirty-fifth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0594.literal: Thirty-sixth year, solar eclipse, did not record the day, the officials lost it.

s0595.chinese: 周君、王赧卒，周民遂東亡。
s0595.literal: Fifty-ninth year, Qin destroyed Zhou, divided its territory.

s0596.chinese: 秦取九鼎寶器，而遷西周公於憚狐。
s0596.literal: Qin took the nine tripods and precious vessels, and moved the Western Zhou duke to Danhu.

s0597.chinese: 後七歲，秦莊襄王滅東（西）周。
s0597.literal: Seven years later, Qin Zhuang Xiang Wang destroyed Eastern Zhou.

s0598.chinese: 東西周皆入于秦，周既不祀。
s0598.literal: Eastern and Western Zhou both entered Qin, Zhou no longer performed sacrifices.

s0599.chinese: 太史公曰：學者皆稱周伐紂，居洛邑，綜其實不然。
s0599.literal: The Grand Historian says: Scholars all claim Zhou attacked Zhou and resided in Luoyi, but comprehensively it was not so.

s0600.chinese: 武王營之，成王使召公卜居，居九鼎焉，而周復都豐、鎬。
s0600.literal: King Wu planned it, King Cheng sent Shao Gong to divine the site, placed the nine tripods there, and Zhou again made its capital at Feng and Hao.

s0601.chinese: 至犬戎敗幽王，周乃東徙于洛邑。
s0601.literal: Until the Quanrong defeated King You, Zhou then moved east to Luoyi.

s0602.chinese: 所謂「周公葬（我）［於］畢」，畢在鎬東南杜中。
s0602.literal: What is called 'Zhou Gong buried me at Bi', Bi is in the Du midst southeast of Hao.

s0604.chinese: 漢興九十有餘載，天子將封泰山，東巡狩至河南，求周苗裔，封其後嘉三十里地，號曰周子南君，比列侯，以奉其先祭祀。
s0604.literal: After Han arose, ninety-some years passed, the Son of Heaven was about to seal Taishan, toured east to Henan, sought Zhou descendants, enfeoffed their posterity Jia with thirty li of land, titled Zhou Zi Nan Jun, ranked as liehou, to continue their ancestral sacrifices.
